attributes.action: Remove North Wales Police chief constable Richard Brunstrom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: since 2002 Richard Brunstrom has made a catalogue of unprofessional,unfounded remarks and behaviour publically. A person in this position should not work within the public sector in such a high profile role. Remarks such as ecstasy safer than aspirin, obsession to legalise heroin, Showing pictures of a headless biker, launching a vicious attack on a retired bank manager,and a irrational obsession with persecuting motorists  this is just to mention a few traits. Sign this petition to remove this Man.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
